description: Performance data about user interactions performed by Elite Orgs.

schema.name: team_owner
schema.description: Team that owns and maintains this route.

schema.name: slo_grouping
schema.description: The SLO grouping that this page rolls up to.

schema.name: org_name
schema.description: The name of the org that this route was loaded for.

schema.name: interaction_type
schema.description: The type of interaction being measured.

schema.name: timestamp
schema.description: The timestamp the query was executed on.

schema.name: name
schema.description: Well-known name of the user interaction.

schema.name: user_id
schema.description: The user id of the user who loaded the page.

schema.name: org_id
schema.description: The org for this route, joinable with clouddb.organizations.

schema.name: duration_ms
schema.description: The duration, in milliseconds, that the route took to load.

schema.name: resource
schema.description: Stripped down name of the route minus org and query params.

schema.name: tags
schema.description: Metadata that is specific to the interaction. I.E. the zoom level on the map.

schema.name: trace_id
schema.description: Opentracing trace id of the parent span - can be joined with gql_query_load.route_load_trace_id.

schema.name: date
schema.description: The date the interaction occurred on.
